description: The secretary to the Liyue Qixing, Ganyu is a Cryo bow user who excels at powerful charged shots and AoE Cryo damage.
info: Ganyu is a top-tier Cryo DPS and support, excelling at charged shot damage and AoE Cryo application. Build her for CRIT DMG, ATK%, and Cryo DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Liutian Archery
skills.desc: Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Cryo DMG and blooms, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Trail of the Qilin
skills.desc: Ganyu dashes backward, leaving an Ice Lotus that taunts enemies and deals AoE Cryo DMG when destroyed or when its duration ends.
skills.details_html:
Trail of the Qilin
Dashes backward, leaving an Ice Lotus that taunts enemies and deals AoE Cryo DMG when destroyed or when its duration ends. Ice Lotus HP scales with Ganyu's Max HP.

skills.name: Celestial Shower
skills.desc: Ganyu summons a Sacred Cryo Pearl that rains down shards of ice, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Celestial Shower
Summons a Sacred Cryo Pearl that rains down shards of ice, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Increases Cryo DMG taken by enemies inside the field.

passive_talents.name: Undivided Heart
passive_talents.desc: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.

passive_talents.name: Harmony between Heaven and Earth
passive_talents.desc: Celestial Shower grants a 20% Cryo DMG Bonus to active characters in the AoE.

passive_talents.name: Preserved for the Hunt
passive_talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Bow-type weapons.

constellations.name: Dew-Drinker
constellations.desc: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: The Auspicious
constellations.desc: Celestial Shower grants 20% Cryo RES to active characters in the AoE.

constellations.name: Cloud-Strider
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Celestial Shower by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Westward Sojourn
constellations.desc: Enemies standing within Celestial Shower's AoE take increased DMG.

constellations.name: The Merciful
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Trail of the Qilin by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Clement
constellations.desc: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.
